thread.section_title: SA Expeditions Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SA Expeditions | saexpeditions.com
thread.title: Diane & Bill
thread.title_full: SA Expeditions reviewed by Diane & Bill

author: Diane & Bill
title: Diane & Bill
text: Our travel coordinator Staci Steele listened to our requirements and patiently tweaked plans as we thought of something new. The result was an outstanding trip. The we were met at the airport without any problems. Our guide Damien was not only extremely knowledgeable but shared his information with passion. He too was sensitive to our age and moving slower. The hotel choices were great, not only good locations but really cool!
